content:
I'm happy to help!

Firstly, kudos to you for trying to establish a better daily routine and cooking more at home! It's great that you're making an effort to prioritize your meals.

Now, let's get to those quick and easy dinner recipes for busy days! Here are some ideas that might help:

1. **One-Pot Wonders**:
	* Pasta with marinara sauce and veggies (15-20 minutes)
	* Chicken and rice bowl with frozen veggies (20-25 minutes)
	* Lentil soup with crusty bread (25-30 minutes)
2. **Stir-Fry Magic**:
	* Chicken and veggie stir-fry with pre-cut veggies and pre-cooked chicken (10-15 minutes)
	* Shrimp and veggie stir-fry with pre-peeled shrimp (10-15 minutes)
	* Veggie stir-fry with tofu and pre-cut veggies (10-15 minutes)
3. **Oven-Ready Meals**:
	* Pre-seasoned chicken breasts with roasted veggies (20-25 minutes)
	* Quesadillas with pre-cooked chicken, cheese, and veggies (10-15 minutes)
	* Baked sweet potato with toppings like beans, cheese, and salsa (15-20 minutes)
4. **Slow Cooker Recipes**:
	* Chili with ground beef and beans (6-8 hours)
	* Chicken tacos with pre-cut veggies and seasonings (6-8 hours)
	* Vegetable curry with pre-cut veggies and coconut milk (6-8 hours)
5. **5-Ingredient Wonders**:
	* Grilled chicken breast with roasted veggies and quinoa (15-20 minutes)
	* Tacos with pre-cooked ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and tomatoes (10-15 minutes)
	* Omelette with veggies and cheese (5-10 minutes)

These recipes are all quick, easy, and delicious, and can be customized to suit your dietary preferences and ingredient availability.

To make the most of your busy days, consider the following tips:

* Meal prep: Chop veggies, marinate meats, or cook proteins in advance to save time during the week.
* Keep a well-stocked pantry: Have staples like olive oil, spices, and canned goods on hand to whip up a meal quickly.
* Use pre-cut or pre-cooked ingredients: Many grocery stores offer pre-cut veggies, pre-cooked meats, and ready-to-use sauces to save you time.

I hope these ideas and tips help you establish a better daily routine and enjoy quick, easy, and satisfying meals on busy days!
